resources.string: Please choose an answer.\n答えを選択してください。
Please press the Menu button on your device to open the Save option.

If you understand and agree to this, please select "Agree".
Please make sure that an XML tree exists in your SD Card\'s \'/usbong/usbong_trees/\' directory!
You\'ve now reached the end. \n 終点に着いた。 \n 你已经到了终点。
Divide your team into two: Group A and Group B.
The word to be guessed by the other group is:
Hit the Menu Button on your phone to record an audio file
Hit the Menu Button on your phone to capture an image
Hit the Menu Button on your phone to draw an image
